name: The last place - Beta for oculus Quest
name_original: The last place - Beta for oculus Quest
description:
The last place

When the whole world is on radioactive flames, all dead beings, hope, one last place to survive. An island that not all parts have radiation.

Oculus Quest Game - Open Beta!   Live in the last habitable place on earth, hunt, build your home, make tools and weapons, die and start again, can you survive?

Version 1.0.0

Next fully update - 1.1.0

More aggressive animals
Firearms
